articles.content: Apple officially released iOS 13.5 to the public this week. The update includes changes such as Face ID improvements for masks, new Apple Music features, and more. Perhaps most importantly, however, … [+6220 chars]

articles.author: Connor Bennett
articles.title: Shroud thinks Valorant is releasing way too early: "It's not ready" - Dexerto
articles.description: Valorant is set for its full release on June 2, but shroud believes that the game is launching far too early and that Riot might be in for a tough time.
articles.content: Streaming star Michael ‘shroud’ Grzesiek believes Riot Games are jumping the gun with the release of Valorant, claiming that the game is missing so much content and still has plenty of lingering issu… [+1911 chars]
